desc: A crystal used to evolve the mock Unit based on Paris
lore: A crystal that radiates yellow light.  It is an Item required to evolve the mock Unit based on Paris. The memories of the real Paris, who discovered that the key to her true potential was connected to her own will, are sealed within this crystal. Noel of the Summoners' Research Lab and Rhynt of the Imperial Library purified this stone, and rumor has it they both had a hand in the growth of the real Paris.
name: Topaz
